content: skill level beginner level 1 jiffy® article #450 6 colors 2 balls each 12 balls total *solid or multi may be used * crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge square should measure about 7 in 18 cm crochet 42 squares in half_double_crochet sew squares together following diagram to finish available in different colorways 70308ad bold blocks afghan 1 2008 *plum purple spray denim spray silver heather dark grey heather camel spray* 70308b bold blocks afghan 2 2011 *violet purple spray denim spray silver heather dark grey heather camel spray* 90255ad applegarth afghan 3 2009 *rust grape apple green silver heather slate camel* similar pattern 90399ad fallen branch afghan 4 4 colors 30 squares works up to a smaller size 70364ad simple subtle squares afghan 5 is worked in strips 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-bold-blocks-afghan-2 2 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/70308b html 3 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-applegarth-afghan-1 variant=32420313497693 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/fallen-branch-afghan 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/simple-subtle-squares-afghan
